src_original: so bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ urago jinnam iva ttacāṃ purāṇiṃ //
tgt_original: 如蛇脫故皮，　　能斷愛根本，

src_original: yo nādhyagamad bhaveṣu sāraṃ buddhvā puṣpam udumbaresya yadvat / sa tu bhikṣur idasṃ jahāty apāraṃ hy urago jīrṇam iva tvacaṃ purāṇam // yo uppatitaṃ vineti rāgaṃ visaṭaṃ sappaviṣam va oṣadhīhi / so bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ urago jinnam iva ttacāṃ purāṇjṃ // yo uppatitaṃ vineti doṣaṃ visaṭaṃ sappaviṣam va oṣadhīhi / so bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ urago jinnam iva ttacāṃ purāṇjṃ // yo uppatitaṃ vineti mohaṃ visaṭaṃ sappaviṣam va oṣadhīhi /
tgt_original: 盡竭欲深泉，　　苾芻勝彼此。

src_original: so bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ urago jinnam iva ttacāṃ purāṇjṃ // yo uppatitaṃ vineti krodhaṃ visaṭaṃ sappaviṣam va oṣadhīhi / so bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ urago jinnam iva ttacāṃ purāṇjṃ // yo uppatitaṃ vineti mānaṃ visaṭaṃ sappaviṣam va oṣadhīhi / so bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ urago jinnam iva ttacāṃ purāṇiṃ //
tgt_original: 如蛇脫故皮，　　能斷於五欲，

src_original: yas tūtpatitaṃ nihanti mānaṃ visṛṭaṃ sarpaviṣaṃ yathauṣadhena / so tu bhikṣur idaṃ jahāty apāraṃ hy urago jīrṇam iva tvacaṃ purāṇam // yo rāgaṃ udicchiyā aśeṣaṃ bisapuṣpaṃ va sareruhaṃ vigāhya / so bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ urago jinnam iva ttacāṃ purāṇiṃ // yo rāgam udācchinatty aśeṣaṃ bisapuṣpam iva jaleruhaṃ vigāhya /
tgt_original: 斷於欲根本，　　苾芻勝彼此。

src_original: sa tu bhikṣur idaṃ jahāty apāraṃ hy urago jīrṇam iva tvacaṃ purāṇam // so bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ urago jinnam iva ttacāṃ purāṇiṃ // sa tu bhikṣur idaṃ jahāty apāraṃ hy urago jīrṇam iva tvacaṃ purāṇam // yo mohaṃ udicchiyā aśeṣaṃ bisapuṣpaṃ va sareruhaṃ vigāhya / so bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ urago jinnam iva ttacāṃ purāṇiṃ // yo moham udācchinatty aśeṣaṃ bisapuṣpam iva jaleruhaṃ vigāhya / sa tu bhikṣur idaṃ jahāty apāraṃ hy urago jīrṇam iva tvacaṃ purāṇam //
tgt_original: 如蛇脫故皮，　　能斷於五結，

src_original: so bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ urago jinnam iva ttacāṃ purāṇiṃ // yo mānaṃ udicchiyā aśeṣaṃ bisapuṣpaṃ va sareruhaṃ vigāhya / so bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ urago jinnam iva ttacāṃ purāṇiṃ // yo mānam udācchinatty aśeṣaṃ bisapuṣpam iva jaleruhaṃ vigāhya / sa tu bhikṣur idaṃ jahāty apāraṃ hy urago jīrṇam iva tvacaṃ purāṇam // yo rāgam udicchiyā aśeṣaṃ kuśa (krama)-saṃgāni va chetta (chetu) bandhanāni / so bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ urago jinnam iva ttacāṃ purāṇiṃ // yo tahnam udicchiyā aśeṣaṃ saritāṃ śīgharayāṃ viśodhayittā / so bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ urago jinnam iva ttacāṃ purāṇiṃ // tṛṣṇāṃ ya udācchinatty aśeṣaṃ saritāṃ śīgharajavām aśoṣayajñaḥ /
tgt_original: 拔於愛欲刺，　　苾芻勝彼此。

src_original: sa tu bhikṣur idaṃ jahāty apāraṃ hy urago jīrṇam iva tvacaṃ purāṇam //
tgt_original: 如蛇脫故皮，　　諸有無家業，

src_original: yo nā 'ccasarī na preccasārī sabbaṃ vītasarī imaṃ prapañcaṃ /
tgt_original: 又斷不善根，　　苾芻勝彼此。

src_original: so bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ urago jinnam iva ttacāṃ purāṇiṃ //
tgt_original: 如蛇脫故皮，　　諸有不熱惱，

src_original: sa tu bhikṣur idaṃ jahāty apāraṃ hy urago jīrṇam iva tvacaṃ purāṇaṃ // yassa vanathā na santi keci mūlā akkuśalā samūhatā 'ssa / so bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ urago jinnam iva ttacāṃ purāṇiṃ // yasya jvarathā na santi ke cin mūlaṃ cākuśalasya yasya naṣṭam /
tgt_original: 如蛇脫故皮，　　斷欲無遺餘，

src_original: (taṃ māggaṃ paṭipajjahvo mārasse 'sā pramohanī / etāhi tubbhe paṭipannā dukkhassa antaṃ kariṣyatha //) vanaṃ chindatha mā rukkhe vano jāyate bhayaṃ / chettā vanañ ca vanadhañ ca nibbanena gamiśśatha // vanaṃ chindata mā rukṣaṃ vanād vai jāyate bhayam /
tgt_original: 截林勿截樹，　　因林生怖畏，

src_original: chitvā vanaṃ ca samūlaṃ tu nirvaṇā bhavata bhikṣavaḥ //
tgt_original: 截林而滅已，　　苾芻得圓寂。

src_original: yāvatā vanadho na cchijjati aṇumātto pi narassa ñātisu /
tgt_original: 截林不斷根，　　因林生怖畏，

src_original: paṭibaddhamano hi tattha so vaccho cchīravako va mātari //
tgt_original: 未斷分毫間，　　令意生纏縛。

src_original: pratibaddhamanāḥ sa tatra vai vatsaḥ kṣīrapaka iva mātaram // ucchinna sineham āttano kumudaṃ śāradikaṃ va pāṇinā / śāntimāggam eva byūhaya nibbāṇaṃ sugatena deśitaṃ //
tgt_original: 心纏最難離，　　如犢戀愛母。

src_original: ucchindhi hi sneham ātmanaḥ padmaṃ śāradakaṃ yathodakāt /
tgt_original: 當自斷愛戀，　　猶如枯蓮池，

src_original: (mānamakkhe va pāpake //) aniccā sabbasaṃkhārā yato praṃñāya paśśati /
tgt_original: 一切行無常，　　如慧所觀察，

src_original: atha nivvaṇḍate dukkhā esa māggo viśuddhiye //
tgt_original: 若能覺此苦，　　行道淨其迹。

src_original: anityāṃ sarvasaṃskārāṃ prajñāya paśyate sadā /
tgt_original: 一切諸行苦，　　如慧之所見，

src_original: atha nirvidyate duḥkhād eṣa mārgo viśuddhaye //
tgt_original: 若能覺此苦，　　行道淨其迹。

src_original: sabbadhaṃmā anāttā ti yato praṃñāya paśśati /
tgt_original: 一切諸行空，　　如慧之所見，

src_original: atha nivviṇḍate dukkhā esa māggo viśuddhiye //
tgt_original: 若能覺此苦，　　行道淨其迹。

src_original: sarvadharmā anātmānaḥ prajñayā paśyate yadā /
tgt_original: 一切法無我，　　如慧之所見，

src_original: tagarañ ca palāśamhi yo naro upanahyati / pattaṃ pi surabhiṃ vāti evaṃ dhīropasevanā //
tgt_original: 如魚湊臭爛，　　人貪競取之， 意者不覺臭，　　習惡亦如是。

src_original: tagaraṃ palāśapatreṇa yo naro hy upanahyati /
tgt_original: 多誐波羅葉，　　眾生往採取，

src_original: patrāṇy api sugandhīni sad evaṃ saṃgamāt satām //
tgt_original: 葉薰香遠布，　　習善亦如是。

src_original: akaronto pi ce pāpaṃ karonte upasevati / śaṅkiyo hoti pāpamhi avaṇṇo cāssa rūhati //
tgt_original: 親近惡知識，　　罪垢日夜增， 如猪身不淨，　　自污兼污他。

src_original: akurvann api pāpāni kurvāṃam upasevate /
tgt_original: 己自不習惡，　　親近習惡者，

src_original: śaṅkito bhavati pāpasya avarṇaś cāsya vardhate //
tgt_original: 為人所輕笑，　　惡名日夜熾。

src_original: sevamāno sevamāne saṃpuṭṭho saṃphusaṃ pare /
tgt_original: 觀習而習之，　　知近而親近，

src_original: śaro litto kalāpe vā alitte upaliṃpati / upalepabhayā dhīro neva pāpasakhā siyā // saṃsevamānaḥ pāpo hi saṃspṛṣṭaḥ saṃsphṛśet parān / śaro liptaḥ kalāpasthān aliptān upaliṃpati / upalepabhayād dhīro naiva pāpasakhā bhavet // tassā phalapuṭasseva ñāyyā saṃpākam āttano /
tgt_original: 毒箭在其束，　　淨者被其污。

src_original: asanto nopaseveyā santo seveya paṇḍīto //
tgt_original: 勇夫能除污，　　去惡不為伴，

src_original: tasmāt phalapuṭasyaiva dṛṣṭvā saṃpākam ātmanaḥ /
tgt_original: 是故知果報，　　智人悉分別。

src_original: asanto nopaseveta santaḥ seveta paṇḍītaḥ // yāvaj jīvaṃ pi ce bālo paṇḍite payirupāsati /
tgt_original: 非親慎莫習，　　習當近於賢，

src_original: yāvajjīvaṃ pi ced bālaḥ paṇḍitāṃ paryupāsate /
tgt_original: 愚人盡形壽，　　承事明智人，

src_original: sukhā mātretā loke tato pettetā sukhā / śāmannatā sukhā loke tato brāhmannatā sukhā // sukhaṃ mātṛvyatā loke sukhaṃ caiva pittṛvyatā / sukhaṃ śrāmaṇyatā loke tathā brāhmaṇyatā sukham // sukhaṃ yāvaj jarā śīlaṃ sukhā śraddhā pratiṣṭhitā /
tgt_original: 耆年持戒樂，　　有信成就樂；

src_original: sukhā attharasā vācā assiṃ mānakkhayo sukho // sukhaṃ yāvaj jarā śīlaṃ sukhaṃ śraddhā pratiṣṭhitā / sukhaṃ cārtharatā vācā pāpasyākaraṇaṃ sukhaṃ // sukho buddhāna uppādo sukhā dhammassa deśanā /
tgt_original: 分別義趣樂，　　不造眾惡業；

src_original: sukhā saṃghassa sāmaggrī samaggrāṇāṃ tapo sukho //
tgt_original: 世有父母樂，　　眾集和亦樂； 世有沙門樂，　　靜志樂亦然；

src_original: sukhaṃ buddhasya cotpādaḥ sukhaṃ dharmasya deśanā /
tgt_original: 諸佛出興樂，　　說法堪受樂；

src_original: sukhaṃ saṃghasya sāmagrī samagrāṇāṃ tapaḥ sukhaṃ // sukhaṃ daṃśanam ayirāṇāṃ saṃvāso pi satāṃ sukho /
tgt_original: 眾僧和合樂，　　和則常有安； 持戒完具樂，　　多聞廣知樂。 覩見真人樂，　　解脫行跡樂， 德水清涼樂，　　法財自集快。

src_original: dhīrā tu sukhasaṃvāsā ñātīnaṃ vā samāgamo //
tgt_original: 得覩諸賢樂，　　同會亦復樂。

src_original: bālāsaṃsargacārī hi dīrghādhvānaṃ praśocati / duḥkho bālair hi saṃvāso hy amitrair iva sarvaśāḥ / dhīrais tu sukhasaṃvāso jñātīnām ivā saṃgamaḥ //
tgt_original: 不與愚從事，　　畢固永已樂， 不與愚從事，　　經歷無數日。 與愚同居難，　　如與怨憎會，
